explanation: [0-0] The video starts with a circular frame at the top showing a black man. He is wearing red headphones and a black headscarf, a gray top with white stripes on the shoulders, smiling and looking to his right. Behind him are gray walls and a cabinet filled with various items. In the middle of the screen, there is a caption: "KSI gets caught in 4k". The lower part of the screen is blurred, showing a man with short black hair and a black top, covering his mouth with his right hand.

[0-4] The black man in the upper part of the video smiles, sways his body, and looks to the left of the screen. At the same time, the man in the lower part of the video removes his hand from his mouth, and then the image becomes clear. He places both hands on his temples and looks down to the left of the screen.
